Reviews.Title: Sony Quality
Reviews.Author: NauticalArt
Reviews.Content: A very nice small digital camera with a convenient zoom. The Carl Zeiss lens is a quality lens and the slim design is easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Camera never worked!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Holmes
Reviews.Content: I don't know what happened here, but I was never able to get beyond the initial settings to be made for a new camera.  It stuck at the language setting.  However I have nothing but praise for Amazon, which immediately gave me a full refund w/o cost for shipping it back.

Reviews.Title: So far so good?
Reviews.Author: ddladybug
Reviews.Content: The camera came on time and everything was there.  I'm still learning how to use the camera and haven't taken too many shots so I can't reallly comment on the quality of the pictures.  I'm hoping it was a good purchase!!
